statements: DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 100 AND value > 50.00
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE time_period_start < '2022-01-01' AND time_period_end >= '2022-03-01'
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
DELETE FROM benchmark_results WHERE execution_time > 100 AND time_completed < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Utilization';
DELETE FROM benchmarking_results WHERE result_id = 100 AND execution_time < 10.5;
DELETE FROM comparisons WHERE time_period_id = (SELECT time_period_id FROM time_periods WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01') AND comparison_result = 'Equivalent';
DELETE FROM benchmark_results WHERE benchmark_name = 'Test Benchmark';
